"Hero Talis":
"When a Talis is equipped by a Hero, it performs \"Hero Talis\" attacks and PAs instead of normal Talis attacks.

Unlike the normal Talis, Hero Talis can use PAs, and is capable of combining the Talis, PAs and Techniques in its attacks.

Some Hero Talis PAs automatically switch to other Hero weapons if you hold the PA button."

"When you charge Hero Talis's Weapon Action, it fires a \"Marker\" towards the target location.

When you have a Marker in place, you can move to it very quickly by using the uncharged Weapon Action."
